Hi,

I was launching a crawl usinh heritrix 3 and in the seeds list I had a=
 URI containing "id". Example :


http://www.site.com/exemple.html?a=3D1&id=
=3D2

And trying to build the Job, I obtained a 

2012-09-26T14:27:01.233Z =
SEVERE Line 93 in XML document from URL [file:/1/hatem/heritrix-3.1.0/./job=
s/job-example/crawler-beans.cxml] is invalid; nested exception is org.xml.s=
ax.SAXParseException: The reference to entity "id" must end with the ';' de=
limiter.

2012-09-26T14:27:01.233Z SEVERE Line 93 in XML document from URL =
[file:/1/hatem/heritrix-3.1.0/./jobs/job-example/crawler-beans.cxml] is inv=
alid; nested exception is org.xml.sax.SAXParseException: The reference to e=
ntity "id" must end with the ';' delimiter.

Apparently Heritrix interprets=
 the word 'id' as a property of a tag.

Is there a solution to avoid this b=
ug?

Thanks
